privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.section1_intro: Bekkurinn collects the following information to provide our service:
section1_items: Name and email (from Google sign-in or registration)
Information about children (name, birthday, dietary needs)
privacy_page.section2_title: 2. How do we use the data?
privacy_page.section2_intro: The data is only used to:
section2_items: Display contact information to other parents in the same class
Keep track of birthdays and class events
privacy_page.section3_title: 3. How do we protect the data?
privacy_page.section3_intro: All data is stored on secure Firebase servers with:
section3_items: Access rules ensuring only class members see data
No data shared with third parties
section4_items: Access all data we store about you
Delete your account and associated data
privacy_page.section6_text: We only use essential functional cookies to keep you logged in. We do not use third-party tracking cookies or advertising pixels.
privacy_page.section7_text: We retain your data only for as long as needed to provide the service to your class. If you leave a class or delete your account, your personal data is permanently removed.
privacy_page.section5_text: If you have questions about privacy, contact us at
privacy_page.notice_text: Bekkurinn is designed with privacy first. We never collect more than necessary and never sell data to third parties.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, completely free. No hidden costs, no commitment. We believe all children deserve organized school activities.
faq.a2: Data security is a priority. We use bank-grade encryption (256-bit). All data is GDPR compliant and stored securely. Only class members see the info.
faq.q3: I'm not tech-savvy. Can I use this?
faq.a3: Absolutely. It's designed to be as simple as possible. If you can use Facebook or Email, you can use Bekkurinn.
faq.a4: No, Bekkurinn works in your browser on phone and computer. No download needed.
faq.q5: I have children in different classes?
faq.a5: No problem! You can be in multiple classes with one account and switch between them easily.
